name: Save Relatel Calls to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new call is received in Relatel, Make will automatically add that message to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rZxmW0-pVxScq-NLHNun3EVb2VdhTE16EOCUoWKDo6o/edit?usp=sharing)
